userid._name: name of person (just for easy editing. dosnt effect any part of the result)
userid.comment: the comment you want for that person

rainbowrole.role: Role id to change color of every min. Make sure the enabled is value is set to true

randomlink: A random link that will be used in embed titles

verify.panelurl: Message link of the verify panel
verify.channel: Channel ID of the gateway message
roles: role id to be given on verify
role id to be given on verify

leave.channel: Channel ID of the gateway message

count.channel: Channel ID to update the member count

ticket.hostedurl: URL (along with protocol) of the hosted web interface of this discord bot without ending with slash
ticket.scripts: channel id to send the scripts
ticket.categ: category id to make the tickets in
ticket.modrole: role id to give access to the chanel when ticket created

website.botdesc: A small description of the bot
website.discordinvite: Discord invite link for the server

server: server id to be used for setting slash commands
